name: Baraka House

reviews.title: Fabulous
reviews.text: Perfect location, away from the hubbub of town, close to the beach and the best beachside restaurants. The cabins are modern (with modern baths) and very clean with good A/C if needed. The locale is beautiful and peaceful. There's many good close-by day trips if you tire of Olympus/Cirali beach. The breakfasts are extensive with several fresh homemade items, and if you want to eat dinner at Baraka House, the meals are terrific. The owners are very friendly and will do just about anything to meet your needs.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great family hotel. Just paradise on the Earth - almost nothing to add. We stayed in Baraka House for 2 weeks in late May and enjoyed each day of our stay. Bungalows are very cosy and clean, located not very close to each other - so you almost don't hear your neighbours. Very nice turkish breakfast, fresh juices and good mood :) And of course hospitality of Ishan and his family. Especially we want to admit dinners at Baraka House - Ihsan will personally cook for you. Grilled fish or meat that was bought especially for you, fresh salads, traditional turkish mezes and some great wine. Perfect dinner in the perfect place.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: If you like peace and tranquility, a sense of family hotel,a quiet beach, great food, superb accommodation and great service head for Baraka.
reviews.title: Just Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We (family of 5) stayed for 8 days in August 2014 and the most fantastic time during this time we walked some of the Lycian Way (Grandpa ferried us up there at 6 am complete with packed lunch), went canyoning (Ihsan organised it all for us and delivered/collected us), saw baby Turtles on the beach (they told where and when) - we also went to the beach every day it's only 10m from the front door.
reviews.title: Unforgettable stay…

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We looked forward to breakfast every day as it was so fresh and had dinner twice in, the freshest fish I've eaten for ages.
reviews.title: Wonderful Expereince

description: Comfortable detached wooden bungalows in a beautiful, spacious, large garden with oranges, lemons and fruit trees in garden, deck chairs, parasols and hammocks are available. Each bungalow has a private terrace, living room with sofa bed and American kitchen, separate bedroom and private bathroom with shower/WC. The bungalows are 45 square meters, consist of two rooms and can accommodate up to 4 people. A terrace (approx 9 square meters). the bungalows are situated some 50 meters from Cirali's beautiful beach and within walking distance of several restaurants and shops.
